definition: A comparative term often used to indicate a greater quantity, extent, or degree of something. It is commonly employed to express an increase or addition in comparison to a previous state or amount.

examples.german: Es gibt nichts mehr zu sagen
examples.english: There is nothing more to say

examples.german: Mehrere Personen haben das gleiche Problem
examples.english: Several people have the same problem

examples.german: Ich habe mehrere Optionen zur Auswahl
examples.english: I have several options to choose from
